metadata.description: Complete financial analysis suite with data acquisition, technical analysis, portfolio optimization, and reporting capabilities for comprehensive investment research.

plugins.name: financial-data-acquisition-cskill
plugins.description: Component skill for acquiring financial market data from multiple sources including APIs, CSV files, and real-time feeds.

plugins.name: technical-analysis-cskill
plugins.description: Component skill for comprehensive technical analysis including indicators, patterns, signals, and trend analysis.

plugins.name: portfolio-optimization-cskill
plugins.description: Component skill for portfolio optimization using modern portfolio theory, risk metrics, and allocation strategies.

plugins.name: financial-reporting-cskill
plugins.description: Component skill for generating professional financial reports with charts, analysis summaries, and investment recommendations.
